title: Services - JJ Holistic Nutritional Therapy
description: We have access to the most cutting-edge laboratory testing methods in science to help us figure out the root cause of your medical issues. We design a treatment plan tailored just for you that eliminate the root problems.

p.li: We have access to the most cutting-edge laboratory testing methods in science to help us figure out the root cause of your medical issues. We also make use of advanced biogenetics testing tools to understand the more concealed imbalances and deficiencies that may be the cause of functional disturbances in your bodily processes. Using this wealth of information, we design a treatment plan tailored just for you that eliminate the root problems.

block1.p: Everyone is treated uniquely because it has never been the case that one type of diet worked for everyone. Think about it, we all have different body shapes, different lifestyles, likes, and dislikes. We are all motivated or demotivated by different things. We react to foods very differently, both physically and emotionally.

p.li: At J&J Holistic Nutritional Therapy, dealing with people is a calling. Besides learning new and exciting ways on how to improve our patient's health, we get to share the same knowledge with our loved ones. Moreover, it is satisfying to see the progress of a client's journey with their health issues and getting to know and educate clients on healthy eating and nutrition.
Our services are based on scientific tests that inform our treatment options and health recommendations.
At J&J Holistic Nutritional Therapy, our mission is to help our esteemed clients achieve their best health in an environment that is understanding, compassionate, and supportive.
Our team of dedicated practitioners is experienced and dedicated to offering the most advanced and comprehensive solutions to all your health needs outside of an emergency.
We help our patients understand their unique symptoms and form a lasting partnership with them to eliminate the underlying cause of disease using safe, effective, and tailored treatment plans.

block3.h2: Initial Interview – Video or In Office

p.li: We will go over your medical or family history, lifestyle, current medications (if there’s any), detailed symptom and, a food journal. Our nutritional consultation is the first essential step to closing the gap by getting to know more about you and whether we can help improve your well-being.

In the interview, We also try to identify the dietary disconnect that may be present in your lifestyle and how to address it. We can make out the necessary and actionable steps you can take to improve and optimize your health. Every patient is unique and thus requires a different approach to holistic wellness.
We perform a Full Functional Evaluation to gain as much information from your body as possible on where deficiencies are and where we need to support you first.

The Functional Evaluation (FE) consists of lingual-neuro, muscle, reflex and energetic testing in order to further assess your biochemical needs and make appropriate, personalized diet and lifestyle recommendations. Other treatments and test may be offered to help determine the root cause of certain ailments. This includes:
